text:
@JhaSanjay I believe now you understood why lockdown is important when you tested covid19 positive,request you to support every Indian and state central gov. in this pandemic instead of doing politics or blame game. Get well soon
@CMOMaharashtra @PMOIndia @INCIndia @BJP4India @NCPspeaks
